Ref:
When you pass the logical ID of this resource to the intrinsic Ref function, Ref returns an Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that uniquely identifies the stream group resource across all AWS Regions. For example:

arn:aws:gameliftstreams:us-west-2:123456789012:streamgroup/sg-1AB2C3De4

For more information about using the Ref function, see Ref.

GetAtt.Description: An Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that uniquely  identifies the stream group resource. For example: arn:aws:gameliftstreams:us-west-2:123456789012:streamgroup/sg-1AB2C3De4.
An ID that uniquely identifies the stream group resource. For example: sg-1AB2C3De4.
